title: Ticket #7743: late materialize digest puts slice and from in the wrong order
description: when a submit digest is created, if the digest has both a slice [::], and From, these are written in the wrong order. The submit parser expects the slice to come after From and before the filename.
remarks:

this is a pretty obscure bug, so no version history.

Looks good.
